title: Ghost Town
description: 1981. Coventry, city of Two Tone and Ska, is riven with battles between skinheads and young Asians.Photographer Baz—‘too Paki to be white, too gora to be desi’—is capturing the conflict on film.Unemployed graduate Maia—serial champion of liberal causes—is pregnant with a mixed-race child.Neither can afford to let the racists win. They must take a stand.A stand that will cost lives.
author: Catriona Troth
